headline: The Vassal Team is happy to announce the release of Vassal {{version}}.
important: There is now a single universal app bundle for MacOS. It runs natively on both 64-bit x86 (Intel) and 64-bit ARM (Apple Silicon) Macs.

Modules saved in {{version_feature}} are not openable by earlier versions of Vassal. We recommend keeping a backup copy of any pre-{{version_feature}} modules you plan to modify in {{version_feature}} until you've verified that everything works to your satisfaction.
Things may be broken which worked previously. If you find a new bug, please report it.

bug_fixes.desc: Allow wizard to load setups from extensions
Spelling correction on Global Options panel
Fix poor performance of Piece Definer; remove spurious blank line from Mass Piece Loader
Fixed IndexOutOfBoundsException in empty chat room
Prevent crash if I/O Exception during CRC calculation
Cancelling Return To Deck no longer causes crash

other_improvements.desc: Do not record Map Id's in saved Deck files so they will load on any Map

bug_fixes.desc: Store correct value in prefs for Module Manager column widths
Labels have incorrect bounds when using italics
Prevent Welcome Wizard from loading multiple pre-defined setups concurrently
Deck Key Commands do not work on subsequent new games
Suppress unhelpful bad data error reports from the Piece Palette
Prevent integer overflow when computing the size of image pixel data in bytes

other_improvements.desc: Editor search revamp: more options and enhanced navigation

bug_fixes.desc: Fix double application of board magnification to board bounds
Prevent SumZone from generating Bad Data Errors
Fix missing custom colors and font styles in Game Piece Layouts
Ensure labels are correctly updated in Replace With Other trait

other_improvements.desc: Documentation: Editor Search section - add a cross-link to main search details
Number in-use traits in Piece Definer
